# Infernal Healing (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]]) \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Magus Spells|Magus 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (1 drop of devil blood or 1 dose of unholy water)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Inner Sea World Guide, pg. 295

You anoint a wounded creature with devil’s blood or unholy water, giving it fast healing 1. This ability cannot repair damage caused by silver weapons, good-aligned weapons, or spells or effects with the good descriptor. The target detects as an evil creature for the duration of the spell and can sense the evil of the magic, though this has no long-term effect on the target’s alignment.
